category: Miscellaneous Symbols And Pictographs -> Emoji modifiers
definition: The Male Teacher, Type-1-2 emoji is a sequence of the ?? Man, ?? Emoji Modifier Fitzpatrick Type-1-2 and ?? School emojis. These are combine http://emojipedia.org/male-teacher-type-1-2/
name: man teacher: light skin tone

bn:00046958n: A person who, or a thing which, educates
A person who educates, esp. a teacher, principal, or other person involved in planning or directing education.
Person who, or a thing which, educates.
A person whose occupation is teaching
A person who teaches a specific skill to another person.
Person who provides education for pupils (children) and students (adults)
A person who is responsible for teaching a class.
People who provide schooling for pupils and students
Teachers or schoolteachers are people who provide education for pupils and students.
A teacher is a person who provides education for students.

bn:00064601n: Someone who is a member of the faculty at a college or university
A professor is a scholarly teacher; the precise meaning of the term varies by country.
A entry-level position in a university faculty, lower than a full professor.
A teacher or faculty member at a college or university.

bn:00001533n: Sexual maturity is the age or stage when an organism can reproduce.
The age or stage when an organism can reproduce
A man is a male human.
An adult human member of the sex that begets young by fertilizing ova.
A human member of the masculine sex or gender.
An adult person who is male (as opposed to a woman)

apple_vendor_description: The man teacher emoji on Apple devices is depicted with a friendly, approachable expression and a light skin tone, often seen in a professional attire that speaks to guidance and knowledge.  Apple's signature smooth gradients and soft lighting give the figure a warm, encouraging presence, making him appear both knowledgeable and kind.  This emoji on Apple devices is commonly used to represent educators, learning, or situations involving instruction and mentorship.
